text: Acon is a commune in the Eure department in Normandie in northern France. ==Geography== Acon is a small country village divided by the Nationale 12. On one side are the Brulés d'Acon and on the other are the Rousset and the Mesnil d'Acon. The Avre river flows between the Brulés and the Rousset et le Mesnil, not unlike the main road does. ==Population== ==Sights== The St Denis church can be found next to the Avre river. ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== Category:Communes of Eure
title: Acon, Eure
